attributes.action: I want the government to make LDN avaliable to the invdiviuals with M.S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: There is a similar petition running on the site, which has already attracted a lot of support, and as such, you may wish to sign this instead: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/LowDNaltrexone/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
